NK032(khi)003:1: // klong sde rdo rje zam pa'i gzhung bzhugs so //
NK032(khi)003:2: gdod ma'i mgon po dang rnam dbyer ma mchis pa
NK032(khi)003:3: dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal
NK032(khi)003:4: lo // byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
NK032(khi)003:5: de la 'dir gsang sngags snga 'gyur rnying ma ba'i
NK032(khi)003:6: ring lugs la rgya che ba bka' ma dang zab
NK032(khi)003:7: pa gter ma gnyis su yongs su grags pa'i dang
NK032(khi)003:8: po la mdo sgyu sems gsum gyi /
NK032(khi)003:9: 'dir sems phyogs rdzogs pa chen po sde gsum las
NK032(khi)003:10: rnal 'byor ma rgyud bde stong sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor
NK032(khi)003:11: gyi snying po'i bcud bsdus shing ye shes gsang ba
NK032(khi)003:12: la sogs pa'i rgyud sde bcu gsum dang /
NK032(khi)003:13: rdo rje'i zam pa dbang gi man ngag la sogs pa'i sgrub sde bcu gsum dang /
NK032(khi)003:14: lta ba'i klong la sogs pa klong dgu'i don gyi
NK032(khi)003:15: bcud phyung ba rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i snyan
NK032(khi)003:16: brgyud rdo rje'i zam pa zhes theg pa thams cad
NK032(khi)003:17: kyi yang rtser gyur pa 'di nyid 'jig rten mig
NK032(khi)003:18: gcig lo chen bee ro tsa nas mkhas pa sh+r+ai
NK032(khi)003:19: sed+ha sogs rgya gar gyi pan chen nyi shu rtsa
NK032(khi)003:20: lnga'i thugs kyi gsang mdzod brtol ba'i gdams pa zab
NK032(khi)003:21: mo la brgyud pa snga phyi bar gsum du byung
NK032(khi)003:22: ba las / phyi ma'i skor yin te bee ro'i 'dra 'bag tu /
NK032(khi)003:23: bdag nyid bee ro tsa na mchis pa 'di //
NK032(khi)003:24: yang dag bcu gcig don dang ye nas ldan //
NK032(khi)003:25: rgya gar yul nas chos bslabs nas //
NK032(khi)003:26: sgra don bsdebs nas bka' bsgyur te //
NK032(khi)003:27: bod kyi rgyal khams dkar por btang //
NK032(khi)003:28: rgyal dang blon po kun log nas //
NK032(khi)003:29: spyugs pas tsha ba'i rong du mchis //
NK032(khi)003:30: rgyud sde klong sde'i bka' bkrol nas //
NK032(khi)003:31: g.yu sgra snying po nyid la gtad //
NK032(khi)003:32: tsha ba'i rgyal khams dkar por btang //
NK032(khi)003:33: yang dag don gcig mchis pa de //
NK032(khi)003:34: mi pham mgon po nyid la gtad //
NK032(khi)003:35: ces spang mi pham mgon po la snyan brgyud du
NK032(khi)003:36: gdams shing de nas bzung ste brgyud pa bdun gyi
NK032(khi)003:37: bar du phung po lhag med 'ja' lus 'od skur
NK032(khi)003:38: grol ba sha stag tu byon pa'i brgyud pa'i bla
NK032(khi)003:39: ma rnams kyi zhal nas zhal /
NK032(khi)003:40: snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa'i zab cing ches dkon pa'i chos skor la /
NK032(khi)003:43: sgom sgrub nyams len gyi skor /
NK032(khi)003:44: zhal gdams gdams pa'i skor dang bzhi'o //
NK032(khi)003:46: sgrub sde bcu gsum gyi snying po snyan brgyud rdo rje zam pa'i rtsa ba'i gzhung chung bzhugs so //
NK032(khi)003:47: ma nor ma bcos bsam 'das brjod med ngang la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK032(khi)003:48: gdod nas dag pa'i byang chub sems nyid kyis //
NK032(khi)003:49: nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi don bstan pa //
NK032(khi)003:50: rna brgyud lung gi gter chen 'grol //
NK032(khi)003:51: bsgom med don gyi gzer chen gdab //
NK032(khi)003:52: brda don 'grol ba'i man ngag sbyin //
NK032(khi)003:53: 'dzin med ngang la mi gnas par //
NK032(khi)003:54: g.yo 'dzin rlung gi man ngag sbyin //
NK032(khi)003:55: sems nyid mi brtan spros chen la //
NK032(khi)003:56: bde chen thig le'i man ngag sbyin //
NK032(khi)003:57: rdo rje'i tshig lam sems kyi lde mig bstan //
NK032(khi)003:58: tha mal gnyug ma so ma lhug pa'i ngang //
NK032(khi)003:59: rten med pas na rig pa rang sar grol //
NK032(khi)003:60: rkyen dang bral bas rig pa rang sar dag /
NK032(khi)003:61: re dogs med par dbyings la gtad //
NK032(khi)003:62: bsam brjod bral bas ting 'dzin mchog /
NK032(khi)003:63: de bzhin nyid du mya ngan 'das //
NK032(khi)003:64: dbang ngang gis rdzogs pas sgom sgrub dge ba'i chos la mi ltos /
NK032(khi)003:65: sku rang chas su gyur pas gnyis 'dzin las grol /
NK032(khi)003:66: don gcig tu rtogs pas rtog dpyod las 'das /
NK032(khi)003:67: 'di ni rdo rje'i lam mchog ste //
NK032(khi)003:68: skal ldan 'bad pa med par grol //
NK032(khi)003:69: grol ba rang byung gzhan las min //
NK032(khi)003:70: bka' sa man+ta nam mkha' dang mnyam pa bde ba
NK032(khi)003:71: kun tu spyod pa'i rgyud las phye ba'i rdo rje
NK032(khi)003:72: snying po'i don gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'i rgyud
NK032(khi)003:74: pad+ma'i snying po'i don nyams su len pa'i sgrub sde bcu gsum las /
NK032(khi)003:75: gdams ngag 'di ni rgyud sde bcu gsum gyi don /
NK032(khi)003:76: sgrub sde bcu gsum gyi snying po rna brgyud rin po che zam pa'i gdams ngag go //
